mapper.sql: SEQ AS seq ,MEM_NAME AS memName ,MEM_ID AS memId ,BOARD_SUBJECT AS boardSubject ,BOARD_CONTENT AS boardContent ,VIEW_CNT AS viewCnt ,REG_DATE AS regDate ,UPT_DATE AS uptDate

choose.otherwise: AND ( BOARD_SUBJECT LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR BOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' )

mapper.select:
SELECT rn,
FROM ( select row_number() over(order by SEQ desc) rn , bs.* FROM board_study bs ) WHERE rn BETWEEN (#{pageNum} - 1) * #{amount} + 1 AND #{pageNum} * #{amount}

select SEQ AS seq ,MEM_NAME AS memName ,MEM_ID AS memId ,BOARD_SUBJECT AS boardSubject ,BOARD_CONTENT AS boardContent ,TO_CHAR(REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS regDate ,TO_CHAR(UPT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS uptDate ,VIEW_CNT AS viewCnt ,USEYN from board_study where SEQ = #{seq}
mapper.insert: insert INTO board_study( SEQ ,MEM_NAME ,MEM_ID ,BOARD_SUBJECT ,BOARD_CONTENT ,REG_DATE ,UPT_DATE ,VIEW_CNT ,USEYN ) values( (SELECT NVL(MAX(seq),0) FROM board_study) + 1 ,#{memName} ,#{memId} ,#{boardSubject} ,#{boardContent} ,sysdate ,null ,0 ,null )
